body_html:
It might be easier if you could provide the self-contained reproducible example code, as the code snippet in the issue is not self-contained.

The issue is that tf.nn.conv3d_transpose only support int32 type of output_shape. But the np.asarray(output_shape) by default will return int64 dtype.

Created a PR #19248 to have int64 support for output_shape.
body_text:

Created a PR #19248 to have int64 support for output_shape.
body:
It might be easier if you could provide the self-contained reproducible example code, as the code snippet in the issue is not self-contained.

The issue is that tf.nn.conv3d_transpose only support int32 type of output_shape. But the np.asarray(output_shape) by default will return int64 dtype.

Created a PR #19248 to have int64 support for `output_shape`.
